document_data.name: ''Kissing Maiden''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Kissing Maiden''''' was the personal [[galleon]] of [[Teldar]], a famed [[pirate]] of [[Immurk's Hold]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ship had a crew of 100 well-trained pirates, and was armed with a small [[catapult]] and two medium [[ballista]]e.
